structure.unit: ARTICLE XIII.5 PROTECTION OF UNDERGROUND UTILITIES

text.section:
Sec. 21-227. Enforcement by civil violation process.
Code inspectors are empowered to issue civil violation notices pursuant to of this Code for any violation of this ordinance, including the incorporated provisions of Chapter 556 Florida Statutes, and to order any excavator to stop work or to not start until there has been compliance with the notification, marking, and repair provisions of this ordinance. This authority exists in addition to that given law enforcement officers pursuant to Section 556.107, Florida Statutes.
